name: Osprey Talon 6 Backpack - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description:
Take some weight off your shoulders...and onto your waist. The Talon 6 has plenty of room for your day hiking essentials, flat tire repair kit, or whatever you need to pack with you. The BioStretch hipbelt keeps the pack stable and close to your body to prevent bouncing.Mesh-covered die-cut harness is lightweight with ridged foam for ventilation.Hipbelt has an easy-pull closure for a snug fit.2 zippered hipbelt pockets carry snacks and small items.Front panel compression straps let you lash on a jacket.2 padded water bottle sleeves.

        Sustainability
